items: Company Annual Account and Ellipro Survey
comments: Address proof is available from DIMS data (Government ID Proof issued by US Companies House).
Annual accounts data is validated with financial details from the 2023 annual report. Ellipro Survey data is missing.
Bank account and postal details are available in DIMS.
Headquarters address is verified from GLEIF data.
Jurisdiction is confirmed as GB from GLEIF data.
Regulatory compliance data is not found in DIMS.
Business scope details are available from the annual report, covering various banking and investment services.
PEP screening data is not found in DIMS.
Revenue details are provided and validated with the 2023 annual report.
Market capitalization details are provided and validated with the 2023 annual report.
